node.html:
• Spearheaded Spectra development from inception, driving product architecture and key technical decisions.

  • Led design and development of core features for scalability, performance, and reliability:

    • Architected serverless workflows for fast processing and visualization of GeoTIFFs, drone imagery, 3D models, and vector files (GeoJSON, shapefiles, dxf etc).
    • Implemented RBAC and an organization layer for enhanced permission control and management.
    • Developed a GIS tool for haulroad analysis, cutting manual work from 2-3 weeks to minutes, offering actionable insights.
    • Designed AI-assisted workflows using Metaâ€™s SAM model for annotating large Geotiffs and images, giving Spectra a competitive edge globally.
    • Led a team of 2 interns to successfully upgrade core backend framework to latest version, removing technical blockers and accelerating feature development.

  • Key DevOps achivements:

    • Maintained an in-house orchestration tool for dynamic AWS instance provisioning to handle compute-heavy tasks at scale.
    • Developed CI/CD pipelines with GitLab CI, automating deployment and Docker image publishing to AWS ECR
    • Automated Lambda function deployments with AWS SAM and containerized applications using Docker and Docker Compose.
    • Set up centralized logging with AWS CloudWatch and Sentry for error monitoring, reducing debug time by 80%
    • Implemented S3 lifecycle policies for cost-effective storage management
    • Maintained infrastructure security to ISO 27001 standards and led 100+ successful production deployments
    • Deployed the application on client AWS infrastructure from scratch, per contract requirements.

  • Additional Contributions:

    • Created documentation and guidelines for consistent team practices.
    • Mentored and onboarded interns, managing their tickets and contributions
    • Actively participated in hiring, conducting over 50+ interviews so far
    • Collaborated with PM and stakeholders to conceptualize, plan, and develop features, running sprints efficiently
    • Skills - Javascript, Typescript, VueJs, Python, Django, Flask, Postgres, SQL, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Docker, CI/CD, System design, Leadership, Mentorship, GIS, UAV

• Built backend service of a dating app
  • Developed all core component of app: User onboarding, swipe, match, moods, recommentation etc
  • Integrated 3rd service RevenueCat for in-app purchase and built subscription module
  • Developed Role Based Access Control (RBAC)
  • Configured AWS EC2 server and SSL certification for hosting backend server
  • Wrote CI/CD script for one click deployment via Github actions
  • Did accurate cloud cost estimation
  • Configured Postgis database on AWS RDS for storing and querying geolocation data
  • Dockerized whole backend server
  • Skills: Node.js, Express, Javascript, Typescript, Postgis, AWS RDS, AWS EC2, Github Actions, Docker

• Worked in frontend team as a ReactJs developer to build a virtual travel platform
  • Architected user profile and community building features which resulted in better user traction on the platform
  • Developed flight search and booking for mobile users which resulted in better user engagement
  • Implemented a variant of Gitflow branching model and guidelines across all the teams which resulted in a 80% increase in release frequency and helped teams to ship features frequently and confidently
  • Explored and implemented various solutions like SSR and SSG to improve the SEO of the product
  • Conducted internal training sessions on Python and advance Git
  • Skills: ReactJs, NextJs, Javascript, Python

• Zulip is an opensource chat and collaborative software written. It's a leading open-source alternative of Slack
  • Fixed couple of bugs primarily in chat markdown system and across other modules
  • Did ground work for silent mention feature
  • Tech Stack: Javascript, CSS

• Worked on project for a New York based client to develop a smart health tech system
  • Led and managed a team of 6 including backend and mobile app developers to start the project from scratch
  • Spearheaded the design, development, and execution of synchronization mechanism for seamlessly polling data from top fitness devices (Fitbit, Garmin and Apple watch) and handling failover
  • Worked on devising and implementing proprietary algorithms to generate various health reports for any time range in realtime
  • Configured auto deployment using Gitlab hooks for Heroku
  • Developed efficient mechanism to generate and update reports in realtime using async task queues
  • Trained and onboarded new hires, curated necessary resources and created documentation for smooth onboarding
  • Skills: Python, Django, ReactJs, Postgres, redis, celery, AWS SES

• Landed an internship offer after getting a special appreciation for the "Technical Scriptor 2017" challenge held by GeeksforGeeks
  • Wrote technical articles on advance algorithms and data structures, programming problem and advance Python and C concepts which is read by thousands of peoples (till this date)
  • Got one of my article featured on GeeksforGeeks homepage
  • Improved and contributed code to the existing popular article on GeeksforGeeks
